text: Toomas Vanem (born 8 June 1965 in Estonia) is an Estonian guitarist and composer. He started his music career in the 1980s. He has played in multiple Estonian rock bands such as Radar, Kontakt, Linnu Tee, Shower etc. In 1987-1991 Vanem played guitar for Russian rock group Dialog. In 1995, Toomas Vanem together with his brother Ivo Vanem, composed the music for the film ’’Ma olen väsinud vihkamast’’(’’Too Tired to Hate’’). In 2014 Toomas Vanem released his first solo album I. American bass legend Stu Hamm also appears on a track here. ==Discography== *I (2014, CD) Toomas Vanem productions ==References== ==Videos== * == External links == * * Category:1965 births Category:Estonian rock guitarists Category:Living people Category:20th-century Estonian musicians Category:21st-century Estonian musicians
title: Toomas Vanem
